item.title: Congratulating the Northwestern University Feinberg School of Medicine for its 150 years of commitment to advancing science and improving health.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

item.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (text: CR S397-398)
Passed/agreed to in Senate: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.(text: CR S397-398)
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S397-398)
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.(consideration: CR S397-398)
Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. (text of measure as introduced: CR S128)
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S128)

summary.text:
Congratulates the Northwestern University Feinberg School of Medicine, in Chicago, Illinois, on its 150th anniversary.

Expresses the Senate's best wishes for its continued success.

Commends the school for its dedication to educating world class physicians and scientists, sponsoring cutting edge medical research, and providing highly specialized clinical care.

(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
